entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 18. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 18. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023
